name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-imagecard-html-react-service-health
title: Service health - Adaptive Card Extension
shortDescription: SPFx ACE Service Health is a SharePoint Framework (SPFx) extension designed to monitor and display the health status of various services within your Microsoft 365 environment.
longDescription: SPFx ACE Service Health is a SharePoint Framework (SPFx) extension designed to monitor and display the health status of various services within your Microsoft 365 environment.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.

references.name: Adaptive Card Documentation
references.description: Detailed documentation on Adaptive Cards including the Adaptive Card designer.

references.name: Adaptive Card Extension Design Guidance
references.description: Design guidance for laying out Adaptive Card Extensions.
